nodes.title: Cloud Native MQ for Apache Kafka Powered by Websoft9
nodes.summary: an open-source stream-processing software platform developed by LinkedIn and donated to the Apache Software Foundation

product.summary: the most widely deployed open source message broker
an open-source stream-processing software platform developed by LinkedIn and donated to the Apache Software Foundation
An open source messaging and Integration Patterns server
A distributed messaging and streaming platform

overview.overview: Apache Kafka® is used for building real-time data pipelines and streaming apps.

highlights: Pre-configured, one-click to deploy on Cloud Server
All codes on your server, secure and customizable
Paid image, free professional support for your business

childMarkdownRemark.html: This is a repackaged Apache Kafka® with professional support for your business. Apache Kafka® is used for building real-time data pipelines and streaming apps. It is horizontally scalable, fault-tolerant, wicked fast, and runs in production in thousands of companies.

faq.key: How can I enable the debug mode of Kafka service?
Is it supported to close some partitions on the existing topic?
Is Java included in this deployment solution?
Is a web-based GUI management tool for Kafka?
